name: SDL Live Content Documentation Portal Dark Grey
description: SDL Tridion Live Content Documentation Portal Dark Grey
css:
@-moz-document domain("sdllivecontent.sdl.com") {
html,
body,
h1, h2, h3, h4,
.contentPanel,
.tocPanel,
.sectiontitle,
#lcModalBlock,
#lcModalBody,
.admin_config_menu_item,
.home_title,
.lc_tab,
.lc-table tr:nth-child(odd)
{ background-color: #444 !important; color: #ddd !important; }

.admin_config_menu_item:hover
{ background-color: #555!important; }

a,
a:visited,
a.main_nav_bar_link,
a:visited.main_nav_bar_link,
.href,
.search_result_header,
.xform_browse_doc_list_actions,
.xform_status_buttons
{ color: #d8d8d8 !important; }

a:hover, a:active,
div .lc_tab.lc_tab_selected
{ color: #fff !important; }

a.main_nav_bar_link,
a:visited.main_nav_bar_link
{ background: #444 !important; }

a:hover.main_nav_bar_link,
a.main_nav_bar_link.selected,
a:hover.main_nav_bar_link.selected
{ background: #555!important; }

.xform_browse_doc,
#footerPanel,
.lc_toc_selected,
input,
select,
textarea,
#search_showPrevNext,
.lc_tab.lc_tab_selected,
.lc_table,
.lc-table tr:nth-child(even)
{ background-color: #555 !important; color: #ddd !important; }

.top_nav_bar_inner,
.vsplitbar, .vsplitbar *
{ background: #555 !important; color: #ddd !important; }

.adv_search_query_display,
.adv_search_wrapper
{ color: #ddd !important; border-color: #555 !important; }

.search_result_highlight,
.highlight
{ color: #0f0 !important; }

}
